Message:
“Thou art too carefree in
my presence, lowly shadow.
’Tis disrespectful.”

Those were the Princess’s
first words to me.

My situation might be more
difficult than I’d anticipated...

B-But, I’m the shadow
to the Princess!
It’ll take more than that
to crush my spirit!

Indeed, there were some
who called the Princess’s
orders selfish...but I sensed
something different.
After all, the Princess is always...

One day, assassins
snuck inside the castle.

Naturally, I disposed of them,
but I was left severely wounded.

But, the Princess suddenly
came rushing over to me.
